name: Hard NBA All-Stars 2004 Quiz / Test | Basketball | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was the head coach of the Eastern Conference?
questions.explanation:
Rick Carlisle.

	Carlisle was fired following the 02-03 season by Detroit. Through the first half of the 03-04 season he lead his new team, Indiana, to the best record in the East.

questions.text: Who was the head coach of the Western Conference?
questions.explanation:
Flip Saunders.

	Flip led the Timberwolves to the best first half record in the west thanks to an improved roster, and many injuries to both the Lakers and Kings teams.

questions.text: Which 2004 All-Star player had the most selections to the All-Star game?
questions.explanation:
Shaquille O'Neal.

	The 2004 All-Star game was Shaq's 11th selection. He has been an All-Star starter 9 times and a reserve 2 times in those 11 selections.

questions.text: What team had the most centers selected to play?
options: Neither team had a true Center
questions.explanation:
West.

	The West had Brad Miller, Shaq, and Yao. The East had Ben Wallace, who is actually a power forward but went on the All-Star ballot as a center, and Jamaal Magloire.

questions.text: How many first time All-Stars were there on both teams combined?
questions.explanation:
6.

	The West had 2 and the East had 4.

questions.text: Which of the following players was NOT an All-Star in 2004?
questions.explanation:
LeBron James.

	LeBron was not a rookie all-star, which many analysts considered the biggest All-Star snub of 2004.

questions.text: How many different teams had an All-Star representative in 2004?
questions.explanation:
17.

	There were 24 players from 17 different teams in 2004.

questions.text: How many players played the 2004 game, in the opposite conference of where they played their first All-Star game?
questions.explanation:
4.

	Three West players had made their all-star debut for the East, while only one East player debuted in the West.

questions.text: Which 2004 All-Star won the 2003 All-Star game MVP award?
questions.explanation:
Kevin Garnett.

	Kevin Garnett won the 2003 game MVP award. That was his first All-Star MVP award.

questions.text: How many combined All-Star games did the Western Conference All-Star players have?
questions.explanation:
49.

	Shaq led the way with 11, and Kevin Garnett had 7.
